profile.name: Ricardo
profile.description:
With the intention of resuming my passion for software development and after having gained experience in other sectors for a few years, I have decided to focus again on my training and growth as a FrontEnd Developer. My goal is to master the technologies of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.

During this year 2023, I have worked hard on carrying out a complete update of my Github and my portfolio, with the purpose of being able to effectively show my skills and knowledge
